name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.3.1
body: - Updates Azure Cosmos DB version to 3.7.6.

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.3.0
body: Update spring boot version to 2.3.0

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.5
body:
* Updated azure-cosmos version to v3.7.3
* Contains memory leak fixes and netty version upgrades from Cosmos SDK v3.7.3 (https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/pull/9934, https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/pull/11271)

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.4
body:
* Fixes issue : #523
* Fixed allowTelemetry flag to take into account from CosmosDbConfig

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.3.FIX1
body:
* Updated azure-cosmos to v3.7.1 for a memory leak fix: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/issues/9023
* Using auto create container flag in reactive repository #509

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.1.0.FIX1
body: * Added auto create collection flag (https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/pull/514)

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.3
body:
* Added new findAll by partition key API: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/471
* Fixes: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/491
* Updated azure-cosmos version to 3.7.0
* Fixed collectionName -> containerName: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/492
* Fixed entityClass & domainClass -> domainType: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/493

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.1.10
body: * Fixes https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/491

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.2
body: * Updated azure-cosmos version to v3.6.0

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.2.M2
body: * Updated azure-cosmos version to 3.6.0-beta.2

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.2.M1
body: * Updated azure-cosmos version to 3.6.0-beta.1

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.1
body:
* Updated Cosmos DB SDK version to 3.5.0
** Fixes: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/issues/6069
** Fixes: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/issues/6707
* Added annotation field to enable/disable auto create collection: #454 
*  Fixed findById APIs behavior, return empty on not found, instead of throwing exception: #451 
* Better Exception handling, exposed CosmosClientException through CosmosDBAccessException
* Exposed requestCharge and activityId through ResponseDiagnostics
* Fixed a bug where sorting was not applied on next page when using CosmosPageRequest

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.1.9
body:
* Added annotation field to enable/disable auto create collection: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/454
* Fixed findById APIs behavior, return empty on not found, instead of throwing exception: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/451

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.1.M1
body:
* Fixed pagination issue when Cosmos DB returns number of documents less than page size. 
* Update Cosmos DB version to 3.4.0
* Provided support for OFFSET and LIMIT queries using CosmosClient. 
* Switched default telemetry to false
* Updated README with pagination examples.

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.0
body:
* Complete Reactive Cosmos Repository Support
* Cosmos DB Request Diagnostics String and Query Metrics Support
* Cosmos DB SDK version update to 3.3.1
* Spring Framework version upgrade to 5.2.0.RELEASE
* Spring Data Commons version upgrade to 2.2.0.RELEASE
* Added findByIdAndPartitionKey, deleteByIdAndPartitionKey APIs
* Removed dependency from azure-doumentdb
* Rebranded DocumentDb to Cosmos
* Addressed: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/423

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.1.8
body:
* Deprecate Document DB APIs. 
* Added findByIdAndPartitionKey, deleteByIdAndPartitionKey APIs. 
* Added Optimistic Locking based on _etag: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/378
* Enabled SPeL expression for document collection name: https://github.com/microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/issues/391
* ObjectMapper improvements.

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.2.0.M1
body:
* Complete Reactive Cosmos Repository Support
* Cosmos DB SDK version update to 3.2.0
* Removed dependency from azure-doumentdb.
* Rebranded DocumentDb to Cosmos

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.1.2.FIX1
body: * Fixed memory leak issue in MappingDocumentDbConverter

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.1.7
body:
* Added Cosmos SDK v3 dependency
* Added Reactive Cosmos Repository
* Updated implementation of DocumentDbTemplate to use Cosmos SDK v3. 
* Other configuration changes for Reactive Cosmos Repository support.

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.1.2
body:
Remove applicationInsights dependency for

* Potential risk of dependencies polluting.
* Incompatibility [issue](https://github.com/Microsoft/azure-spring-boot/issues/598) with Java 11.
* Avoiding potential performance impact to CPU and/or memory.

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.0.7
body:
Remove applicationInsights dependency for

* Potential risk of dependencies polluting.
* Incompatibility [issue](https://github.com/Microsoft/azure-spring-boot/issues/598) with Java 11.
* Avoiding potential performance impact to CPU and/or memory.

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 3.0.0.M1
body:
As cosmosdb sync sdk will be deprecated right now, we may need to migrate sdk from cosmosdb sync to async.

* Remove the dependency of cosmosdb sync sdk
* Leverage cosmosdb async sdk.
* Export sync API from spring-data-commons, forward compatible with [spring-data-cosmosdb 2.0.5](https://github.com/Microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/releases/tag/v2.0.5).

After cosmosdb asyn sdk upgrade to RxJava 2.x, we may setup new async sdk leveraging [spring data reactive](https://spring.io/blog/2017/06/20/a-preview-on-spring-data-kay).

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.0.5
body:
* Fix issue #193 
* Fix issue #212 
* Add keyword exists, startsWith
* Update Readme

```java
Boolean existsByFirstName(String firstName);
List<Student> findByFirstNameStartsWith(String firstName);
```

All supported keywords please refer to #144 .

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.0.4
body:
* Renaming package from documentdb to cosmosdb, 
* Add new feature of query method keyword, 16 keywords from Sql API supported.
* Add new feature of query with paging and sorting.
* Simplify the configuration of spring-data-cosmosdb.
* Add deleteCollection and deleteAll API.
* Bug fix and defect enhancement.

Thanks @Xeinn for contribution.

Supported Sql keyword List:
* [x] AND `List<Person> findByFirstNameAndLastName(String firstName, String lastName)`
* [x] OR `List<Person> findByFirstNameOrCity(String firstName, String city)`
* [x] Is_EQUALS `List<Person> findByFirstName(String firstName)`
* [x] AFTER `List<Person> findByDateBefore(Date date)`
* [x] BEFORE `List<Memo> findByDateBefore(Date date)`
* [x] CONTAINING `List<Person> findByFirstNameContaining(String firstName)`
* [x] ENDING_WITH `List<Person> findByFirstNameEndsWith(String firstName)`
* [x] FALSE `List<Project> findByHasReleasedFalse()`
* [x] GREATER_THAN `List<Project> findByForkCountGreaterThan(Long forkCount)`
* [x] GREATER_THAN_EQUALS `List<Project> findByStarCountGreaterThanEqual(Long count)`
* [x] IN`List<Project> findByCreatorIn(Collection<String> creators)`
* [x] IS_NOT_NULL `List<Project> findByNameIsNotNull()`
* [x] IS_NULL `List<Project> findByNameIsNull()`
* [x] LESS_THAN `List<Project> findByStarCountLessThan(Long starCount)`
* [x] LESS_THAN_EQUAL `List<Project> findByForkCountLessThanEqual(Long forkCount)`
* [x] TRUE `List<Project> findByHasReleasedTrue()`

name: Last release for spring-data-documentdb 2.x.x, use spring-data-cosmosdb in the future
body:
This repository has been renamed to `spring-data-cosmosdb`, together with the released package name.

Previously the released packages are named with `spring-data-documentdb`, after this [spring-data-documentdb v2.0.3](https://github.com/Microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/tree/documentdb-release/2.0.3) version, no package named with `spring-data-documentdb` for `2.x.x` will be released.

This `spring-data-documentdb 2.0.3` version will be relocated to `spring-data-cosmosdb` according to this [pull request](https://github.com/Microsoft/spring-data-cosmosdb/pull/94).

name: Spring Data DocumentDB 0.1.5
body:
* Fix cannot save and query Date field
* Support indexing policy for collection
* Align the injection to setter from spring-data-commons
* Code clean and refactor.

name: Spring Data CosmosDB 2.0.3
body:
* Package is renamed to spring-data-cosmosdb
* Upgrade Spring Framework to 5.0.5

name: Spring Data DocumentDB 2.0.2
body:
* Fix cannot save and query Date field
* Support indexing policy for collection
* Integrate constants variables
* Align the injection to setter from spring-data-commons
* Code clean and refactor.

name: Spring Data DocumentDB 2.0.1
body:
* Upgrade azure documentdb sdk version to [1.15.2](https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.microsoft.azure/azure-documentdb/1.15.2)
* Upgrade to spring-data-commons to `2.0.1.RELEASE`
* Add `And` to repository custom query
* Remove PartitionKey value from repository query method parameter

name: Spring Data DocumentDB 0.1.4
body:
* Add support for custom query
* Support nested List in domain #32

name: Spring Data DocumentDb 0.1.3
body:
New feature:
  - Supports spring-boot-starter-data-rest.

name: Spring Data DocumentDb 0.1.2
body:
**New feature**:
- batch find, save and delete. pls note Azure Document DB doesn't support batch operation itself. So batch operation in Spring data repository is wrapper of single entity operation.

name: Spring Data DocumentDb 0.1.1
body:
**New feature**:
1. Spring Data repository support. 
    - find by Id
    - find all
    - save
    - delete
    - delete all
2. Spring Data `@Id` annotation support.
3. Custom collection name by `@Document(collection="collectionname")` annotation.
